name: NMO Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A file with the .nmo extension has been maliciously renamed and encrypted by NMO ransomware . It contains a document, image, video, or other file the ransomware is holding hostage. The .nmo extension and an email address are appended to the file's normal extension, producing a compound extension like .docx.[ [email protected] ].nmo .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
